description:
{"blocks":[{"key":"3d4nn","text":"DNA/RNA extraction is performed using the QIAamp® Viral RNA Mini kit from Qiagen without the addition of carrier RNA to the AVL buffer and an additional nuclease step prior to extraction. The nuclease step is introduced to degrade any DNA/RNA that may be in the sample after the virome extraction protocol (dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.b2qaqdse) has been performed. Please note that even though the kit is a viral RNA extraction kit, viral DNA will also be extracted.


","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":42,"length":39}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":307,"length":41}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"FA1BAC905C2111EC9AA60A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.b2qaqdse"}}}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"8pic0","text":"Before beginning this protocol, ensure that wash buffers have been properly diluted with ethanol and that the centrifuge is available and not chilled as low temperatures may impede ethanol evaporation.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2jjqn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"175l1","text":"Note that, unlike when using the kit directly, carrier RNA should not be added to the AVL buffer.\n\nThe Pierce Universal nuclease should be diluted 100 times (ie. by mixing 1 uL nuclease with 99 uL SM buffer/sterile water)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"21eja","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"49okq","text":"Wear gloves when performing this protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6di1h","text":"For each sample, pipet    100x diluted Pierce Universal Nuclease (2.5units/uL) to an empty 1.5 mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9uv41","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"5D5281D04DF411ECB00D893F1031E3FC","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
